# Contributing to Clawdwars MCP

Thank you for your interest in contributing to Clawdwars MCP!

## Getting Started

1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/Clawdwars_MCP.git`
3. Create a branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature-name`
4. Install dependencies: `npm install`
5. Build: `npm run build`

## Making Changes

- Keep commits focused and descriptive
- Follow the existing code style (TypeScript, functional patterns)
- Add tests for new features when applicable
- Update documentation as needed

## Submitting a Pull Request

1. Push to your fork
2. Open a PR against `main` branch
3. Describe your changes and why they're needed
4. Link any related issues

## Code of Conduct

Be respectful and constructive. We welcome all contributors and maintain an inclusive environment.

## Questions?

Open an issue or start a discussion. We're happy to help!
